title.native: ガイコツ書店員本田さん

description:
Honda-san is at war - with business, with out-of-print books, and with people who love manga! Who knew there were so many laughs to be found at the manga counter of a bookstore?! These are the day-to-day happenings that take place at a certain bookstore where the love of manga is abundant.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Autobiographical
tags.description: Real stories and anecdotes written by the author about their own life.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

本田さん×鷹の爪

node.description:
__Height:__ 169.6cm (5"7')
__Agent:__ 81 Produce

__[Website](https://www.saitosoma.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/somasaito/) | [Profile (81produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%95%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E6%96%89%E8%97%A4%E3%80%80%E5%A3%AE%E9%A6%AC&id=47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SomaStaff)__

He started his singing career in 2017. Named Best Rookie Actor at the 9th Seiyu Awards (2015) and won the Singing Award at the 16th Seiyu Awards (2021).

**Non-anime roles:**
~!• [Chongyun](https://anilist.co/character/233899/Chongyun) - Genshin Impact (VG)!~

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - The Handsome Guy is First in Line \ Yaoi Girls from OVERSEAS!!!
Episode 2 - Let Me Introduce My Crazy Colleagues in This Bookstore!
Episode 3 - Battle Without Honor and Humanity / Lost in Manga
Episode 4 - Mission: An Outside Work-ish Job
Episode 5 - It's a Book Signing!! Everyone Gather Up \A Fascinating Erotic Story
Episode 6 - The Man with a Secret Power \ Our Fair-Day War
Episode 7 - Tell Me! Wholesaler-san \ A Networking Drinking Party for Booksellers
Episode 8 - Bookstores are so Wonderful! \ The Shelves with and without Restrictions
Episode 9 - A Book about Life, Death, and Rebirth
Episode 10 - An Outstanding Bookseller \ Swapping Section Heads
Episode 11 - The Alternate Skull-face Bookseller Honda-san \ You Can Quit Your Job Whenever You Want
Episode 12 - Merry Christmas, Mr. Bookstore \ It's Time to Close
